name: Level 3 - Destroy Undead
description: Destroy Undead is a 3rd level spell in the School of Air Magic. It causes damage to all undead creatures on the battlefield â€“ including the caster's troops. Immunities: All non-undead creatures are naturally immune to the spell. Additionally, the artifact Pendant of Death can make undead troops immune to the spell. If all the creatures on the battlefield are immune to the Destroy Undead spell, it can not be cast.
